long_description: Bike commuting just got a little easier thanks to the Timbuk2 Shift Pannier messenger bag. It converts from a pannier to messenger bag so you can easily carry your gear on and off the bike. Exterior is built to last with rugged ballistic nylon and heavy-duty stitching; water-resistant lining helps keep contents protected and makes cleaning a breeze. Pannier hardware is easily concealed behind a zippered panel, helping it keep a low profile while being worn as a messenger bag. Front organizer panel features a slip pocket for a bike lock or other small items and a zip pocket for keeping essentials like ID, phone or wallet secure and close at hand. Top flap secures with 2 side-release buckles and rip-and-stick tabs. Stretch laptop pocket fits most 15 in. laptops; rigid back ensures proper function as a pannier and protection for the laptop. Comes with a removable, adjustable shoulder strap for easy off-bike transportation. Timbuk2 Shift Pannier bag includes 2 Vista loop attachment points for bike lights.
short_description: Bike commuting just got a little easier thanks to the Timbuk2 Shift Pannier messenger bag. It converts from a pannier to messenger bag so you can easily carry your gear on and off the bike.
